pkgmetadata.longdescription: Run Predictions Inside the Database // It parses a fitted 'R' model object, and returns a formula in 'Tidy Eval' code that calculates the predictions. It works with several databases back-ends because it leverages 'dplyr' and 'dbplyr' for the final 'SQL' translation of the algorithm. It currently supports lm(), glm(), randomForest() and ranger() models.
